sentence.Network_en: He spoke with much too much laisser - aller.
Ils se remirent en marche , munis d'un laisser - passer.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们带着通行证又上路了.

sentence.Network_en: Few people believe that laisser faire could solve the economic problems of the United States.
sentence.Network_cn: 很少人相信自由竞争能解决美国的经济问题.
